name: bobobeats_comment_comments
description: Hack Reactor FEC ghrsea07 project component

scripts.seed: npm run .createSeedData && npm run .fill_db && echo --- MYSQL DATABASE bebo_beats SUCCESSFULLY SEEDED WITH TABLES: comments, sub_comments, users ---
scripts..fill_db: mysql -h bobo_beats_comment_db -P 3306 -uroot < ./database/data_generator/userSetup.txt && mysql -h bobo_beats_comment_db -P 3306 -u bobo_beats_comments -p < ./database/data_generator/commentsGenerator.sql && mysql -h bobo_beats_comment_db -P 3306 -u bobo_beats_comments -p < ./database/data_generator/usersGenerator.sql && mysql -h bobo_beats_comment_db -P 3306 -u bobo_beats_comments -p < ./database/data_generator/subCommentsGenerator.sql
scripts..fill_db_withoutUser: mysql -h bobo_beats_comment_db -P 3306 -u bobo_beats_comments -p < ./database/data_generator/commentsGenerator.sql && mysql -h bobo_beats_comment_db -P 3306 -u bobo_beats_comments -p < ./database/data_generator/usersGenerator.sql && mysql -h bobo_beats_comment_db -P 3306 -u bobo_beats_comments -p < ./database/data_generator/subCommentsGenerator.sql

author: Jake Wija
